data.title: Serving your real estate needs in the Greater Columbus Area
data.meta_description: Find real estate in Greater Columbus. Use LifePoint Real Estate search engine to find Greater Columbus real estate by price, bedrooms and more. We have every listing from every real estate company in the Greater Columbus area.
data.meta_site_name: Greater Columbus Real Estate | LifePoint Real Estate
data.text:
Welcome to LifePoint Real Estate!

Improving lives and circumstances by guiding you from where you are to where you want to be.

LifePoint Real Estate agents are hand-selected, highly-respected real estate consultants who fully embrace a customer-first approach by elevating relationship-building to the forefront of every client interaction. Everyone has a story and we are all at different points of life with unique wants and needs. Understanding these truths and meeting people right where they are is at the heart of our company.

LifePoint agents guide buyers and sellers, in their real estate journey, from where they are to where they want to be. Integral to our company DNA is an attitude of gratitude and commitment to “give back” as each and every agent donates a portion of their commission to a local charity and gives of their time to a variety of community service opportunities throughout the year.
